Class WCWikiUtils

java.lang.Object
io.github.iherongh.wikicraft.wiki.WCWikiUtils
public class WCWikiUtils extends Object
Utility methods for wiki operations.

    • getAllPages

      @NotNull public static @NotNull ArrayList<String> getAllPages(@NotNull @NotNull String namespace)
      Get all pages in a specified namespace
      Parameters:
      namespace - The namespace to get pages from.

      Expected values are:

      • category
      • file
      • help
      • talk
      • template
      • user
      Returns:
      A list of all pages in the specified namespace.
      Since:
      0.1.0

    • getPageInfo

      @Contract(pure=true) @NotNull public static @NotNull HashMap<String,String> getPageInfo(String page)
      Retrieves information about a specific wiki page.
      Parameters:
      page - The title or name of the wiki page to retrieve information for.
      Returns:
      A HashMap containing key-value pairs of page information. Currently returns an empty HashMap.
